name: Light Fable
description:
Light Fable is a fantasy stealth game where you will have to find your way to freedom.

The main idea for the game is to tell the tale of a refugee who has had his home destroyed through no fault of his own and is now trying to escape the ones who destroyed it and to reconnect with his lost family. 

To do that the player will have to take our character through dark forests, caves and pits full of enemies, but not all is doom and gloom, along the way there will be some rays of hope to rekindle the player's will to continue through the story.

Features

  • Fantasy inspired visuals;
  • Light manipulation;
  • Unique story;
  • Cute character.

The current version is still only a prototype test level, there are still some mechanics that are being improved, so feedback is appreciated.
